short_summary: Purchase of MatLab Licenses (or equivalent) and related technical specifications
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of MatLab Licenses (or equivalent) and related technical specifications.
full_summary:
### MatLab (or equivalent) for SSC

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00024893: T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM020362/24893
* **Publication Date**: December 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Project Overview

This solicitation seeks the purchase of MatLab Licenses (or equivalent) and associated technical specifications. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation, submit responses, and receive updates.

#### Mandatory Instructions

* Only registered bidders can submit responses.
* Bidders must carefully review the solicitation and its amendments.
* Suppliers are responsible for their own costs in preparing and submitting their response.

#### Contracting Entity and End User Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
* **End User Entities**: Shared Services Canada
* **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Clara Whittaker
* **Phone**: 343-553-8354
* **Fax**: 343-553-8354

#### Amendment Information

* **Amendment 001**: Published on January 2, 2024. Amendements include a table of requested items, a signal processing toolbox requirement, and an extension of the closing date.

#### Attachments

* Available for download at https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/2F0719DA-E21F-47E1-AEC6-A3C961DC68AF
* Available for download at https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/0F9BA30C-4D06-48EE-B549-122DB9DE553F
* Available for download at https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/A6850E9F-ACF6-47F6-8DF6-E3CB1068F0BA

The text should be clean
